data.title: Directory Of Cemetery Burials
data.meta_description: Niagara Jewish Community located in St.Catharines
data.text:
Cemetery of Congregation B’nai Israel

The cemetery is located at 120 Bunting Road (next to the former Barber Monuments)

Burial Records – St. Catharines – 2022 Update

PICTURES OF MONUMENTS LISTED ALPHABETICALLY

Please notify us of any errors or omissions

Gravesites are indicated: section, row, and plot.

The row numbers start at the entrance; section 1 is on the right, section 2 on the left of the center path, section 3 continues left of the path beyond section 2, numbering is from the center path outwards.

To view a picture of the headstone, click on the name and follow the link
